title: No objects under Context in palette when scripting a data set
description: When attempting to script a data set, there are no objects visible under the 'Context' section in the palette. This is causing issues with data manipulation and scripting tasks.
OB: When scripting a data set, under the 'Context' section in the palette, no objects are displayed.
EB: I expect to see a list of relevant objects under the 'Context' section in the palette when scripting a data set. These objects should include data fields and dataset properties that can be used in the script.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the software and navigate to the data set scripting interface.
2. Look at the 'Context' section in the palette on the left-hand side of the screen.
3. Observe that no objects are displayed under the 'Context' section.
